summary: All three requirements appear to be implemented in the diff. REQ-1 (progress bar color change in Header) and REQ-3 (logo update in Header) are both visible in Header.tsx changes. REQ-2 (border removal in MessageInput) appears to be addressed based on the MessageInput.tsx modifications and the frontend-file-summaries.txt description indicating the textarea has 'no border' styling. No hallucinated features detected.
